definition: Provisional Municipal Council of Macau/Câmara Municipal de Macau Provisória
pinyin: lin2 shi2 Ao4 men2 shi4 zheng4 zhi2 xing2 wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 臨時澳門市政執行委員會

sentences.english: Residential carpenters erect all types of homes, including apartments and townhouses.
sentences.chinese: 住宅木匠會建造各式各樣的房屋，例如公寓和市政廳。

sentences.english: I wanted to complain about them to the city of San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我決定向舊金山市政府提意見。

sentences.english: Thanks to Manchester City Council, he will never have to sit through another open-top bus parade.
sentences.chinese: 感謝曼徹斯特市政府，他可以不用在敞蓬大巴上慶祝。

sentences.english: Will you tell me the way to City Hall?
sentences.chinese: 請你告訴我去市政廳該怎麼走好嗎？

sentences.english: The city council is axing recycling facilities in order to save money.
sentences.chinese: 市政會爲了省錢正在削減廢物回收利用設施。

sentences.english: Municipality public utility enterprises are responsible for proposing the enterprises' projects of utilizing foreign capital.
sentences.chinese: 城市市政公用企業負責提出本企業的利用外資項目。

sentences.english: The practice of new to the company plant represents municipal government of Suzhou of delegate of week person character congratulation.
sentences.chinese: 周人言代表姑蘇市政府對公司新工廠的歇業暗示祝賀。

sentences.english: The importance of scenery designing in city sewage disposal place was discoursed.
sentences.chinese: 論述景觀設計在市政污水處理場建設中的重要性。

sentences.english: The city government labels it “community-style management.”
sentences.chinese: 北京市政府稱它爲“社區式管理”。

sentences.english: LOS ANGELES - City officials are putting South Los Angeles on a diet.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉機的市政官員在給整個南洛杉機人節食。

sentences.english: A masked man ran amok in the town square.
sentences.chinese: 一個戴面具的人殺氣騰騰地闖進了市政廣場。

sentences.english: No causalities have been reported, according to a statement issued by the municipal government Monday.
sentences.chinese: 沒有傷亡的報道，根據市政府本週一發表聲明。

sentences.english: Question 17: Can the supplementary facilities of municipal planning for Fuzhou South Station area be provided?
sentences.chinese: 能否提供福州南站片區市政配套規劃情況？

sentences.english: The commerce Department has for many years been a stepchild of the city government.
sentences.chinese: 多年以來商業局一直不受市政府的重視。

sentences.english: A third Writer-in-Residence programme is being organised.
sentences.chinese: 臨時市政局現正籌辦第三屆特聘作家計劃。

sentences.english: I interviewed Barlow at city hall.
sentences.chinese: 我在市政大廳採訪了巴洛。
